TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Antigua_and_barbuda, title = Antigua_and_barbuda, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antigua_and_barbuda} }

S.FORM: Antigua and Barbuda hya' ga cyux maki' tay 17 03 N, 61 48 W na cung Meco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 442.6 sq km (maki' tay 201ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 442.6 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 93,581. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 20.50 , lhlahuy hya' ga 22.30 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 57.20 . Angtika ru Paputa, nanu yasa Angpa son nha raral, qalang qani ga. maki cyalpihay ru Tasiyang na ska, kocitayma ga AG. Angtika ru Paputa ga spiyang maki rhyal ska bsilung, maki cikay cipoq na bsilung nya uzi. sazing qalang qani ga maki cinbwanan ga cipoq balay squilq nya, 2016 kawas ga 10.10 mong nanak squilq nya. ego skayal nha, snhyang nha ga cyorokay. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Saint John's. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mawpuw qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Elizabeth II, aring ryax tay 6 squ byacing tay 2 sa kawas 1952 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. kkian angtika ru Paputa ga maki beh syaw na bislung, labang nya ga (281 ). rroq rhyal nya. te sazing lga Paputa (161 ), rroq balay rhyal nha. wagiq balay ga (Mount Obama) , hay pa ga 402 , mkilux balay kayal nya, ga 27 , mqwalax na qsya ga 1100 . ggalan pila Antika ru Paputa spiyang galan thang ga zyaw na Lyoko. trang 2000 kawas lga yaqeh cyogun la. ungat squilq mwah mzwi' maki cikay koba' nya. baq kmalay tapang, ,kikay na lenki. qutux squilq Amirika Ellen lalu nya. yeqeh na htuw zyaw qani lga, myaqeh kwara zyuwawa na ginko la. khmaya na squilq rarang squilq ga . maki cikay oco squilq, spiyang na squilq ga ru . hga ga snhi cyorokya kwara. gaga',smlokah lahuy na snhyan , gaga' na Antika ru Papuya tm'nga ru koka na mari ga pang cyo. 2007 kawas piyang pslyaq pang cyo cinbwanan . kahal mari,qasu sqasay na smalah la. qutux kawas spat byacing maki sqani sqas sqasay.qutux qutux ryax mita ta sinbun. (Daily Observer) ru (Caribbean Times). 77 na squilq ga snhi cyorokay kwara, cipoq na squilq ga (17.6 ) snhi . zyaw na hetay Angtika ru Paputa smsun zywaw pklahang (Antigua and Barbuda Defence Force; ABDF), i Angtika ru Paputa na zyaw hetay rngu', maki qutux kbhul pitu pgal squilq, maki pitu paga magal squilq, yasa ga spiyang cipoq balay cinbwanan na zyaw na hetay.
